name: Tears of Flame
description:
Make a flame and a tear work together to scape in this puzzle 2d platformer with 2 players local multiplayer.

I was inspired by a childhood memory with a game i played with my friends multiplayer in the same keyboard and I tried to bring it for this game, so if you can, I recommend you play it with a friend.

PS. Occurred sometimes a bug where the box get stuck, you just have to push it back and them try to push it foward again, didn't had time to solve it.
